verses.name: Matthew 27:27
verses.text: Then the soldiers of the governor took Jesus into the common hall, and gathered unto him the whole band of soldiers.

verses.name: Matthew 27:28
verses.text: And they stripped him, and put on him a scarlet robe.

verses.name: Matthew 27:29
verses.text: And when they had platted a crown of thorns, they put it upon his head, and a reed in his right hand: and they bowed the knee before him, and mocked him, saying, Hail, King of the Jews!

verses.name: Matthew 27:30
verses.text: And they spit upon him, and took the reed, and smote him on the head.
